document.full_text: the irish government still owns 25 percent of aer lingus, but the company's chief executive, christoph mueller, says, 'i believe we are ready to finally leave the parents behind.'
document.title: a stronger aer lingus says it is ready to fly solo
lines_and_colors: the irish government still owns 25 percent of aer lingus, but the company's chief executive, christoph mueller, says, 'i believe we are ready to finally leave the parents behind.'
